details: First, a detail shot can be image with any subject matter that is small size or small in overall relation to the general subject.
Sports photography is the capture of sports, games, exercises, tutorial and other various activities through photography.
It is a specialization of commercial photography, the products of which are used in advertisements, magazines, packaging, menus or cookbooks.
Social media photography is simply exchanging one marginalised audience for another. The benefit is that method must be exclusive.
Lifestyle photography is a genre of photography that mainly aims to capture and show of portraits of people in situations in any conditons he likes.
Wedding photography is a specialty in photography that is primarily focused on the photography of events relating to weddings.
